TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlInputFile extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class HtmlInputFile Inherits HtmlInputControl Implements IPostBackDataHandler
type HtmlInputFile = class inherit HtmlInputControl interface IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 允許以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML 項目。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用伺服器控制項來處理檔案上傳二進位或文字從瀏覽器用戶端到伺服器。Use the server control to handle uploading binary or text files from a browser client to the server. 檔案上傳適用於 Microsoft Internet Explorer 3.02 或更新版本。File upload works with Microsoft Internet Explorer version 3.02 or later. > [!NOTE] > 控制項的設計是要在局部網頁呈現期間使用只在回傳的案例中，而不是在非同步回傳的案例。The control is designed to be used only in postback scenarios and not in asynchronous postback scenarios during partial-page rendering. 當您使用控制內控制項，必須上傳檔案所使用的控制項面板物件。When you use a control inside an control, the file must be uploaded by using a control that is a object for the panel. 控制項用來更新選取的區域，而不是回傳以更新整個頁面的頁面。 controls are used to update selected regions of a page instead of updating the whole page with a postback. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [UpdatePanel 控制項概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)並[網頁局部呈現概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). 若要指定要上傳檔案，輸入檔案 (例如，"C:\MyFiles\Test.txt 」) 的完整路徑，在文字方塊中的控制項。To specify the file to upload, enter the full path to the file (for example, "C:\MyFiles\Test.txt") in the text box of the control. 您也可以選取檔案，依序按一下**瀏覽**按鈕，然後將它在找出**選擇檔案** 對話方塊。You can also select the file by clicking the **Browse** button and then locating it in the **Choose file** dialog box. > [!NOTE] > 屬性控制項必須設為"multipart/表單資料 」 這個控制項才能正常運作。The property of an control must be set to "multipart/form-data" for this control to work properly. 控制項並沒有內建的方式，回傳至伺服器。The control does not have a built-in way to post back to the server. 將檔案上傳到伺服器，使用方法中所包含的物件屬性。To upload the file to the server, use the method of the object contained in the property. 這項作業通常是在事件處理方法，例如按鈕按一下。This operation is usually done in an event-handling method, such as for a button click. > [!NOTE] > 當您使用方法的類別中，請務必指定根的路徑 (例如，"C:\MyFiles\Test.txt 」)。When you use the method of the class, make sure to specify a rooted path (for example, "C:\MyFiles\Test.txt"). 行為方法可以在中指定[httpRuntime 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)組態區段`requireRootedSaveAsPath`屬性。The behavior of the method can be specified in the [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) configuration section with the `requireRootedSaveAsPath` attribute. 此屬性的預設值為 `true`。The default value of this attribute is `true`. 如果您將這個屬性設定為`false`，然後使用，指定不含路徑的方法會嘗試將檔案置於`systemroot`\system32\inetsrv 目錄。If you set this attribute to `false`, then using the method with no path specified will attempt to place the file in the `systemroot` \system32\inetsrv directory. 根據預設，此目錄會有寫入保護;因此，檔案可以儲存那里。By default, this directory is write-protected; therefore, the file can not be saved there. 請確定提供的帳戶將其 ASP.NET 所使用的目錄中您想要用來儲存檔案的寫入權限。Make sure to provide write permission for the account used by ASP.NET for the directory where you want to store the file. 當上傳大型檔案，使用`maxRequestLength`的屬性[httpRuntime 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)來增加允許的最大檔案大小的項目。When uploading large files, use the `maxRequestLength` attribute of the [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) element to increase the maximum allowable file size. 當檔案超過指定的大小，瀏覽器會發出 DNS 錯誤。A DNS error is generated in the browser when the file exceeds the specified size. 上傳大型檔案時，您也可能會收到下列錯誤訊息：You might also receive the following error message when uploading large files: aspnet_wp.exe (PID: 1520年) 已被回收，因為記憶體耗用量超過 460 MB （60%的可用 RAM)。aspnet_wp.exe (PID: 1520) was recycled because memory consumption exceeded 460 MB (60 percent of available RAM). 如果您遇到這個錯誤訊息時，增加的值`memoryLimit`屬性中[processModel 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b8fe20e-74c8-4566-b72c-ce5f83c8e32d) Machine.config 檔案的項目。If you encounter this error message, increase the value of the `memoryLimit` attribute in the [processModel Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b8fe20e-74c8-4566-b72c-ce5f83c8e32d) element of the Machine.config file. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項來建立簡單的檔案上傳案例。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to create a simple file upload scenario. 針對此範例正常運作，您需要建立名為目錄`Temp`在電腦的磁碟機 c。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||「 檔案 」 的常值字串。The "file" literal string.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立 類別的新執行個體。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the class. 針對此範例正常運作，您需要建立名為目錄`Temp`在電腦的磁碟機 c。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputFileCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputFileCtor/CS/htmlinputfilectorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputFileCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputFileCtor/VB/htmlinputfilectorvb.aspx#1)]

Public Property Accept As String
public: property System::String ^ Accept { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 MIME 編碼方式的逗號分隔清單，用以限制使用者所能選取的檔案類型。

span.span: Gets or sets a comma-separated list of MIME encodings used to constrain the file types the user can select.

value.span: MIME 編碼方式的逗號分隔清單。

span.span: The comma-separated list of MIME encodings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定檔案類型可供上傳到伺服器。Use this property to specify the file type that can be uploaded to the server. 比方說，若要限制映像選取項目，將此屬性設定為"影像 / \*"。For example, to restrict the selection to images, set this property to "image/\*". > [!NOTE] > 支援這個屬性是與瀏覽器相依。Support for this property is browser-dependent. 請檢查您的瀏覽器，以判斷它是否支援這個屬性。Check your browser to determine whether it supports this property. 建議您使用伺服器端程式碼，以確保該檔案是預期的類型。It is recommended that you use server-side code to ensure that the file is of the expected type. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以限制使用者選取的映像檔以外的任何檔案。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to restrict the user from selecting any file other than an image file. 針對此範例正常運作，您需要建立名為目錄`Temp`在電腦的磁碟機 c。因為支援屬性為瀏覽器相依，則會執行伺服器端檢查來確保只有映像上傳。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. Because support for the property is browser-dependent, a server-side check is performed to ensure that only images are uploaded. 如果可以讀取已上傳的檔案，做為擲回例外狀況型別。An exception is thrown if the uploaded file can not be read as an type. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputFile.Accept Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile.Accept Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputFile.Accept Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile.Accept Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制實作介面，有兩種方法：和。The control implements the interface, which has two methods: and . 方法會呼叫方法，一律會傳回`false`，這表示，控制項的狀態不由 ASP.NET 網頁架構管理。The method is called by the method and always returns `false`, indicating that the control's state is not managed by the ASP.NET page framework. 方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定編碼時的網頁控制項，屬性設定為"multipart/表單資料的 」。If no encoding is specified for the Web page's control, the property is set to "multipart/form-data". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，讓`Title`屬性永遠會加入到每個自訂控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that a `Title` attribute is always added to each custom control. 針對此範例正常運作，您需要建立名為目錄`Temp`在電腦的磁碟機 c。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 瀏覽器的安全性限制可防止此值正加以維護，跨多個要求。Browser security restrictions prevent this value from being maintained across multiple requests. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用起始的公用程式會將檔案傳送到伺服器的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to initiate the utility that transfers the file to the server. 請注意，如果上傳的檔案，以位元組為單位的大小超過的值屬性，該檔案未上傳。Note that if the size of the uploaded file in bytes exceeds the value of the property, the file is not uploaded. 針對此範例正常運作，您需要建立名為目錄`Temp`在電腦的磁碟機 c。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputFile.PostedFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile.PostedFile Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputFile.PostedFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile.PostedFile Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得用戶端電腦上檔案的完整路徑。

span.span: Gets the full path of the file on the client's computer.

value.span: 用戶端檔案的完整路徑。

span.span: The full path of the client's file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會擷取用戶端的電腦 (例如"C:\MyFiles\Test.txt 」) 上的檔案的完整路徑。The property retrieves the full path of the file on the client's computer (for example "C:\MyFiles\Test.txt"). 當您需要知道提交檔案的電腦上儲存檔案時，這非常有用。This is useful when you need to know where the file is stored on the computer submitting the file. 這個屬性也通常會用來判斷原始的檔案名稱中。This property is also commonly used to determine the original file name. 若要取得原始的檔案名稱，剖析這個屬性的值。To get the original file name, parse the value of this property. > [!NOTE] > 屬性是唯讀的。The property is read-only. 如果您嘗試指派值給這個屬性，就會擲回。If you attempt to assign a value to this property, a is thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以顯示用戶端的電腦上的檔案的完整路徑。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the full path of the file on the client's computer. 針對此範例正常運作，您需要建立名為目錄`Temp`在電腦的磁碟機 c。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C.
